pkgmetadata.longdescription: <p>The REST API enables you to interact with the Wavefront service by using standard REST API tools. You can use the REST API to automate commonly executed operations, for example to tag sources automatically.</p><p>When you make REST API calls outside the REST API documentation UI, to authenticate to the service, you must use an API token associated with a user account or a service account. For information on how to get the API token and examples, see <a href=\"http://docs.wavefront.com/using_wavefront_api.html\">Use the Wavefront REST API.</a></p> # noqa: E501
